scoring.set_definition: Compare the SET of predicted labels for the contrast to the ground-truth set; duplicates and order are ignored; strings must match exactly. The grader reads cell_types_predicted from the parsed EVAL_ANSWER object and scores labels_predicted.Week6_vs_Sham_up.
scoring.description: Pass if the predicted increased cell-type set for Week6 vs Sham achieves Jaccard â‰¥ 0.67.
